about_the_game:
Traildown: Downhill Mountain Biking is all about giving the player the maximum passion from the ride. Go as fast as you can, just on edge, and try to achieve the best time. Achieve medals and compare yourself to the others on the leaderboard!

The game consists of a campaign with tens of unique levels. The estimated gameplay time is about 4 hours. Achieving perfect times and climbing to the top of the leaderboards takes 10/100s of hours and very big balls. Can you make it?

You are able to fully customize your bike with any color and a huge variety of patterns.

I am a Ph.D. student indie developer. I have been developing the fre2play franchise "Engine Evolution" for 6 years, and now I have decided that I would like to try a different challenge. I always enjoy riding the bike down the hill fast, and I am trying to capture it as best as possible in this upcoming game.

name: Traildown: Downhill Mountain Biking

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 bit
  • Processor: 2,2+ GH Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD disk is recommended, GPU compute shader capability required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 bit
  • Processor: 3,0+ GH Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD disk is recommended, GPU compute shader capability required

short_description: Go as fast as you can, just on edge. Just you and your bike. Experience the maximum passion from riding and try to achieve the best time possible.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Portuguese - Portugal
